name: hsa12-21.-database-replication
description: - Create 3 docker containers: mysql-m, mysql-s1, mysql-s2 - Setup master slave replication (Master: mysql-m, Slave: mysql-s1, mysql-s2) - Write script that will frequently write data to database. - Ensure, that replication is working. - Try to turn off mysql-s1 (stop slave). - Try to remove a column in  database on slave node (try to delete last column and column from the middle). - Write conclusion in readme.md
